workflow 0.1.0
  • Reference

Setup directory and templates for a new research study

Source: R/create_study.R
create_study.Rd

This function can be used to automatically setup your study directory by creating folders and template scripts

create_study(type = "data analysis", sessions = 1,
  figures.dir = FALSE, manuscript.dir = FALSE,
  presentations.dir = FALSE, other.dir = c(), masterscript = NULL,
  rawscript = FALSE, scorescript = FALSE, mergescript = FALSE,
  path = ".")

Arguments

type

String. Options: "data collection"; "analysis".
sessions

Numeric. How many sessions will the study have?
figures.dir

Logical. Create figures directory? default = FALSE
manuscript.dir

Logical. Create manuscript directory? default = FALSE
presentations.dir

Logical. Create presentations directory? default = FALSE
other.dir

List of other directories you want to create
masterscript

Logical. Download masterscript template? default = TRUE
rawscript

Logical. Download rawscript template? default = FALSE
scorescript

Logical. Download scorescript template? default = FALSE
mergescript

Logical. Download mergescript template? default = FALSE
path

String. Home directory file path
scripts.dir

Logical. Create script directory? default = TRUE
data.dir

Logical. Create data files directory? default = TRUE
raw.dir

Logical. Create raw? default = TRUE
messy.dir

Logical. Create raw messy directory? default = TRUE
messy.name

String. Name of messy direcotry. default = "messy"
scored.dir

Logical. Create scored directory? default = TRUE
tasks.dir

Logical. Create tasks directory? default = TRUE
documents.dir

Logical. Create documents directory? default = TRUE
results.dir

Logical. Create results directory? default = TRUE
generic

Logical. Download all generic templates? default = FALSE
demographics

Logical. Download demographics template? default = FALSE
gf

Logical. Do you want to download gf template files?
wmc

Logical. Do you want to download wmc template files?
ac

Logical. Do you want to download all attention control template files?
antisaccade

Logical. Do you want to download antisaccade template files?
stroop

Logical. Do you want to download stroop template files?
flanker

Logical. Do you want to download flanker template files?
stroopDL

Logical. Do you want to download stroopDL template files?
flankerDL

Logical. Do you want to download flankerDL template files?
va4

Logical. Do you want to download va4 template files?
sact

Logical. Do you want to download sact template files?

Contents

  • Arguments
